entry.title: Adviser gets personality
entry.summary:
Thanks to one of the designers at Jam3, Pedro Barroso, Adviser now has a logo and an identity. Added we are happy to announce the first version of the documentation; the API is growing and the need to document features is here.

Check out the new logo...
